area.title: Large open field
area.description: You are standing in a large open field, the grass is long and brushes your ankles. You can just about see the tips of small yellow flowers sticking out where they have been swamped by the unkept grass. To the north you can see a large building.

items.name: knife
items.description: An ordinary knife, the type you might use to cut your food at the dinner table.

items.name: fork
items.description: An ordinary fork, the type you might use to stab your food at the dinner table.

items.name: spoon
items.description: An ordinary spoon, the type you might use to eat your pudding at the dinner table.

items.name: spork
items.description: An ordinary spork, you could eat ANYTHING with this

npcs.name: John
npcs.description: A burly man with faint aroma of coconut.

npcs.name: Jane
npcs.description: A dainty woman with a slight frame and bright smile.

area.title: Building entrance
area.description: You are standing at the enterance of a large university building. Above the door is a large sign that reads The University of Portsmouth. It appears the door is open.

npcs.name: Bill
npcs.description: A moustachioed gentleman with a fancy for scrambled eggs.

area.title: Inside the University
area.description: Standing inside the university building you can see why this environment might be a good place for people to learn things.

area.title: this is a lecture theatre
area.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Cupiditate quia recusandae aliquid vitae atque neque odit sequi rem eius qui vel amet praesentium quasi est perspiciatis ducimus eligendi corrupti dicta?

area.title: Zacs Palace
area.description: You find yourself inside Zacs palace, the greatest palace in Stourport.
